title: LF Members For a Gold-Plat Clash team
body:
Top - Taken (Plat 3)
Jungle - Taken (Plat 2)
Mid - Taken (Plat 1)
Bot - Taken (Plat 4)
Support - Taken (Plat 5)

Add me in game - Kayzo  and tell me what role you prefer and I'll add you to the team!

replies.body: Ill take top, plat 2 who can play tank tops confidently and also play making toplaners such as gnar
ill add you when i get home :D
